level.heading: TANK TIGHTNESS TESTING UPON UPGRADE (ยง 20-5804)

level.text: Upon completion of an UST system upgrade and prior to placing the UST system in operation, a tank tightness test shall be performed on an UST system that satisfies the precision testing requirements set forth in ยง 6007, unless the tank is upgraded by cathodic protection and the owner or operator complies with ยง 5801.5(c).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 40 DCR 7835, 7862 (November 12, 1993); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 7699 (October 1, 1999).
